QuestData.Title: Surrounded!
QuestData.Description: Our situation is nearly hopeless. We were ordered to take the Wailing Ziggurat with a handful of men.$B$BWe'll be lucky if we can hold this position against the Scourge. We're outnumbered, injured and have no escape route.$B$BIf you can take some of the pressure off of us, we might be able to solidify our position. Kill some of the undead circling the structure - we'll hold off their advance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Corporal Venn at Death's Stand wants you to slay 7 Ziggurat Defenders.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you make any progress? We're in a bind here.
QuestData.RewardText: That should buy us some time, $n. We'll hope against hope for reinforcements from Valiance Keep.
